Parkour Classes in Scranton, Pennsylvania

Beginner Adult Classes (ages 14+)

Come learn your true potential. You'll walk away from this session with the ability to view your surroundings in a different light (or in the cases of night training, a lack thereof).

You'll never see everyday surroundings the same way again!

November 2015 Location: University of Scranton. The closest address is 900 Mulberry Street, Scranton, PA. Meet us near the intersection of Quincy Avenue and Mulberry Street. Parking is available along Quincy Avenue.

Time: Every Sunday promptly at 3:00pm. Be on time! We may leave the meeting area and it might be difficult to find us.

Cost: Classes cost *$20. No monthly contract or obligation. Just pay when you come, and keep coming if you like what we do!

*I want these classes to be accessible. We have a price reduction for those with financial need, and also a Traveler Package for those who travel more than 30 miles to attend Parkour Endure's events. Please Contact Us for more information.

Classes with Parkour Endure are led by coaches certified through A.D.A.P.T. You, are guaranteed the highest quality parkour coaching offered in the region. If it would be your first class with Parkour Endure, please call John at (717) 343-4727 so you know what you need to bring.

Free Training Sessions

These free sessions are pure camaraderie and exploration. Open training sessions, or "jams", are great opportunities to go back to the roots of how parkour started: outside, unorganized, being challenged by friends, and being challenged with friends.

Everyone and Anyone is welcome, even complete beginners. Keep an eye on our Meetup Calendar for these free sessions.
